headline: Ecommerce website for the first smart mailbox.
description: Custo is building the first ever smart mailbox. They focus on bringing a product that is not only safe and practical but also beautiful by design. The website and art direction is a reflection of those attributes.

headline: Agency website designed for Motto速, global branding agency.
description: Motto速 is a global branding agency founded by Sunny and Ashleigh. Besides their branding services they also do a lot of public speaking. The website let's this all shine in a fun way with a lot micro interactions.

headline: Ecommerce website designed for healthy selfcare brand Ray速.
description: Ray速 is a selfcare brand that makes products good for your health and for the planet. Besides the design of the website I also helped them out with the art direction, visual identity and packaging design.

headline: Online experience designed for modular housing company Ark Shelter.
description: Ark Shelter builds beautiful designed cabines which you can live in, in nature or use as a cabin in your own backyard. The design of the website reflects the values and overal feel of their product.
